Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: NAPATAN PERIOD (not after); NEW KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Vase
Description: Ovoid vase with a pointed base, high shoulder and a wide but short neck that flares slightly at the top. The clay is very hard and fine, pink in colour and covered with a white-beige slip on the exterior surface. Throwing marks are higly visible.
